milestones.title: Set Your Career Goals
milestones.description: Get on the right career track by targeting the specific jobs you’re interested in. In this milestone, you’ll explore careers, choose your favorites and begin building your list of career goals.

activities.title: Chart your career path
activities.description: Learn why it’s important to establish clear goals and how to research your options.

activities.title: Set your career goals
activities.description: Use the Career Exploration Tool to browse job types, and begin your career goal list.

milestones.title: Sharpen Your Skills
milestones.description: Whether you're a short-order cook or a CEO, every job has a required skillset.  Find out what skills you need for the jobs that are on your career goal list - and how to improve in these areas.

activities.title: Skill basics
activities.description: Find out why skills matter so much to employers.

activities.title: Gaining experience
activities.description: Learn how to acquire skills for the jobs that interest you.

activities.title: Develop the important skills
activities.description: Use the Skill builder tool to start developing the skills you need.

milestones.title: Build Your Resume
milestones.description: You can't get the job without the interview - and you can't get the interview without a great resume. Learn what makes a resume stand out and how to customize yours for each job you pursue.

activities.title: Discover what recruiters want
activities.description: Make employers sit up and take notice. Watch and learn how.

activities.title: Learn how to create your targeted resume
activities.description: Why it's critical to tailor your resume to the job, and how to do it.

activities.title: Build your resume
activities.description: Use the Resume Builder tool to create a tailored resume for any job.

milestones.title: Craft Your Image
milestones.description: How you're perceived will affect your job search success. In this milestone you'll find five ways to create a professional image that will move you closer to the career you want.

activities.title: What's your brand?
activities.description: Learn about professional branding and why it's important to your current and future career success.

activities.title: The elevator pitch
activities.description: Get tips on creating this short introduction about yourself.

activities.title: Your online presence
activities.description: Potential employers will likely look you up online. Here’s how to make sure they see your best side.

activities.title: LinkedIn Basics
activities.description: Learn how to create an effective LinkedIn profile-which could be one of your most powerful career tools.

activities.title: Dress for success
activities.description: Appearance matters. Follow these guidelines to help you become the well-dressed interviewee who gets the job.

milestones.title: Network Like a Pro
milestones.description: Networking is all about building quality relationships with fellow professionals - relationships that can lead to employment. This milestone offers activities that will teach you to network like you've been doing it forever.

activities.title: Learn networking basics
activities.description: What exactly is networking-and how can you make it part of your daily routine? Find out here.

activities.title: Use LinkedIn
activities.description: Building a powerful professional network on LinkedIn is easy if you follow these simple tips.

activities.title: Join professional organizations
activities.description: If you're new to your field, professional organizations can help you meet people who share your career interests.

activities.title: Put yourself out there
activities.description: Asking your network for help can help your job search. Here's how to craft emails and social media posts that say you're on the market.

activities.title: Create a plan
activities.description: Keep yourself on track by creating a networking plan. Here's how.

milestones.title: Write a Great Cover Letter
milestones.description: Don't skip it! Your cover letter can actually make or break your chances of getting hired. Learn what's in a great cover letter and how to craft yours.

activities.title: What employers want to see
activities.description: What do hiring managers look for in a cover letter - and what turns them off? Find out here.

activities.title: Get your story straight
activities.description: Start brainstorming for the exceptional cover letter that gets you noticed.

activities.title: Polish it up
activities.description: Use our cover letter checklist to ensure your cover letter is ready for prime time.

milestones.title: Ace Your Interview
milestones.description: With little practice, you can gain the confidence to ace any interview. here, we will help you get prepared to present your best self.

activities.title: Learn what employers want
activities.description: Hear what hiring managers have to say about the importantce of interviewing well.

activities.title: Be a good storyteller
activities.description: Discover how to answer interview questions in a powerful, memorable way.

activities.title: Do your research
activities.description: Make sure you know your stuff when it's time for the interview.

activities.title: Use the Interview Prep tool
activities.description: The Interview Prep tool will help you practice common questions and learn strategies for tackling each of them.

activities.title: Explain your career history
activities.description: How to explain when and why you changed jobs.

activities.title: Ask your own questions
activities.description: Coming prepared with questions shows a true interest in the position.

activities.title: Practice makes perfect
activities.description: The best way to improve your interview skills is practice, practice, practice.

activities.title: Do informational interviews
activities.description: This is a great way to learn about a company and career, and whether a job is a good fit for you.

milestones.title: Develop Your Game Plan
milestones.description: Knowing how to get through to a busy hiring manager is critical. The activities in this milestone will help you create a plan to get your application seen - and give you a real edge in your job search.

activities.title: What hiring managers want
activities.description: Learn what hiring managers have to say about creating your job search game plan.

activities.title: Select and prioritize job postings
activities.description: Learn how to find the right job openings and how to prioritize them.

activities.title: Apply through an insider
activities.description: Get your application to the top of the pile by connecting with someone you know at the company.

milestones.title: Search and Apply
milestones.description: Now it's time to put your preparation in to action. Learn how to tailor your resume and cover letter to specific jobs, how to submit applications and how to keep track of them - and how to brush up on your interviewing skills before each interview.

activities.title: Customize it
activities.description: Want to get noticed? Make your resume and cover letter match the specific job you're applying for.

activities.title: Use the Job Search tool
activities.description: Search through over 1 million job openings, see who offers tuition assistance and track the jobs you have applied to.

activities.title: Track your job applications
activities.description: Keeping track of the applications you have submitted with help you be more effective in your job search.

activities.title: Prepare for interviews
activities.description: Brush up on your interviewing skills with these important tips.

activities.title: Follow up
activities.description: Learn why it's important to follow up after job interviews - and how to do it right.

activities.title: Offers and Negotiations
activities.description: What to keep in mind when deciding whether to accept a job offer.

milestones.title: Advance Your Career
milestones.description: Hard work alone is not enough. To be successful in any job you must manage your career and your professional relationships. Here are some activities to help you keep moving up the ladder.

activities.title: Professional growth
activities.description: How to take charge of your own development to enhance your career.

activities.title: Building relationships
activities.description: Here's an in-depth look at relationship building in your workplace and industry.

activities.title: Getting promoted
activities.description: Discover how to impress your boss and ultimately get promoted
